summary.subject: Two postdoc positions at KFUPM
summary.institution: King Fahd University of Petroleum and Minerals (KFUPM)
summary.duration: Two years, with possibility of extension for an additional two years
qualifications: Completed or near completion of a Ph.D. in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a closely related field.
Candidates currently holding postdoc positions are encouraged to apply.
summary.application_instructions: Interested candidates are invited to send their CV or direct any inquiries.
